div.p: ${object.beneficiary0_id.name}, te damos la bienvenida a nuestra comunidad Más Médicos

div.style: font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Tahoma, sans-serif

font-size: 12px; font-family: 'Montserrat', 'Trebuchet MS', 'Lucida Grande', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Lucida Sans', Tahoma, sans-serif; mso-line-height-alt: 14.399999999999999px; color: #555555; line-height: 1.2;
div.p: A continuación te damos información importante, ¡pon mucha atención!

td.style: font-size: 1px; line-height: 1px; border-top: 1px solid #BBBBBB;

div.style: font-family: sans-serif
font-size: 12px; font-family: Maven Pro, sans-serif;; mso-line-height-alt: 14.399999999999999px; color: #555555; line-height: 1.2;

div.div:
Esta es la confirmación de tu compra
Plan (Adquirido): ${object.main_product_id.name}
Vigencia: Suscripción por % if object.main_product_id.subscription_template_id.is_fixed_policy: ${object.order_line[0].product_uom_qty|int} % else: ${object.main_product_id.subscription_template_id.subscription_duration} % endif
% if object.main_product_id.subscription_template_id.recurring_rule_type == 'daily': días % endif % if object.main_product_id.subscription_template_id.recurring_rule_type == 'weekly': semanas % endif % if object.main_product_id.subscription_template_id.recurring_rule_type == 'monthly': meses % endif % if object.main_product_id.subscription_template_id.recurring_rule_type == 'yearly': años % endif
% if object.main_product_id.subscription_template_id.is_fixed_policy:
Precio:
${format_amount(object.amount_total, object.pricelist_id.currency_id)}
% else:
% if object.main_product_id.subscription_template_id.recurring_interval == 1 and object.main_product_id.subscription_template_id.recurring_rule_type == 'monthly': Precio mensual: % elif object.main_product_id.subscription_template_id.recurring_interval == 3 and object.main_product_id.subscription_template_id.recurring_rule_type == 'monthly': Precio trimestral: % elif object.main_product_id.subscription_template_id.recurring_interval == 6 and object.main_product_id.subscription_template_id.recurring_rule_type == 'monthly': Precio semestral: % elif object.main_product_id.subscription_template_id.recurring_interval == 12 and object.main_product_id.subscription_template_id.recurring_rule_type == 'monthly': Precio anual: % elif object.main_product_id.subscription_template_id.recurring_interval == 1 and object.main_product_id.subscription_template_id.recurring_rule_type == 'yearly': Precio anual: % endif ${format_amount(object.amount_total, object.pricelist_id.currency_id)} % endif
Método de Pago:
% if object.payment_method_type in ('Credit Card', 'Cash', 'PSE'): % if object.payment_method_type == 'Credit Card': TC ${object.payulatam_credit_card_masked} % elif object.payment_method_type == 'Cash': Efectivo % elif object.payment_method_type == 'PSE': PSE % endif % else: % if object.benefice_payment_method == 'payroll_discount': Descuento de nómina % elif object.benefice_payment_method == 'window_payment': Pago por ventanilla % elif object.benefice_payment_method == 'libranza_discount': Descuento por libranza % endif % endif
